resources.string: Phone tilt angle at which the Wakeup alert should begin
During the wakeup alert, vibrate the phone for _ seconds before starting the ringing sound
Help us keep Poink free. Just Share
Once you open Poink, hold the phone upright and click the centre circle to start…
Poink is now activated and running in the background…
You can continue with other things, but keep holding the phone upright…
If you start falling asleep, the phone in your hand tilts.\nPoink instantly starts alerting you and continues to do so till you hold the phone upright again.
Thats it! You are ready to use Poink now.\n\nMake sure to use Poink in a stable environment where no harm can occur to the phone or any person.
